1001.msg: Email is required and it should be a string.

1004.msg: Password must be at least 8 characters long. It must contain at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 special character and 1 number.

1005.msg: firstName is required and it should be a string.

1006.msg: firstName length must be greater than 3.

1007.msg: lastName is required and it should be a string.

1008.msg: lastName length must be greater than 3.

1009.msg: Email already exists please use different one.

1010.msg: User account not exists against this email.
